title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout. Build 2002071610021.
OB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the entire second row is also removed.
EB: When pressing the Delete button, only the first item on the second row should be deleted. The second row should still remain intact.
SR:
1. Open the Coolbar.
2. Press the Delete button.
3. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted and the second row is completely removed.
